muted: {{name}} has muted your microphone. No participant can hear you.

lowerHand.auto: It seems you have started speaking, so your hand will be lowered.

permissionsRemoved.camera: The host has disabled video for all participants.
permissionsRemoved.microphone: The host has disabled the microphone for all participants.
permissionsRemoved.screen_share: The host has disabled screen sharing for all participants.

waitingParticipants.one: One person wants to join this call.
waitingParticipants.several: Several people want to join this call.

transcript.limitReached: The transcription has exceeded the maximum allowed duration and will be automatically saved.
transcript.requested: {{name}} wants to start the meeting transcription.

screenRecording.limitReached: The recording has exceeded the maximum allowed duration and will be automatically saved.
screenRecording.requested: {{name}} wants to start the meeting recording.

transcript.message: Your recording is being saved! We’ll send the transcript to {{email}} as soon as it’s ready.
transcript.default: Your recording is being saved! We’ll send the transcript to your email as soon as it’s ready.

screenRecording.message: Your recording is being saved! We’ll send a notification to {{email}} as soon as it’s ready.
screenRecording.default: Your recording is being saved! We’ll send a notification to your email as soon as it’s ready.
